mapper.select: SELECT T.MessageType, COUNT(1) MessageCount, ( SELECT stuff( ( SELECT DISTINCT TOP 5 ',' + CustomerName FROM ( SELECT MessageType, CASE BizType WHEN 'Opportunity' THEN B.CustomerName WHEN 'Clue' THEN C.Name WHEN 'OpportunityGiveUp' THEN D.CustomerName WHEN NULL THEN '' ELSE '' END CustomerName FROM S_Message A WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN B_Opportunity B WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.BizID = B.ID AND A.BizType = 'Opportunity' LEFT JOIN B_Clue C WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.BizID = C.ID AND A.BizType = 'Clue' LEFT JOIN B_OpportunityGiveUp D WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.BizID = D.ID AND A.BizType = 'OpportunityGiveUp' WHERE A.IsDel = 0 AND A.Status = 1 AND ISNULL(A.IsRead,0) = (CASE WHEN A.MessageType IN ('12D36558-A8A1-20D4-58E5-612338026AE7') AND ISNULL(A.IsRead,0) = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AND ISNULL(A.IsApprove,0) = 0 AND A.MessageType = T.MessageType AND A.Receiver = T.Receiver AND A.ProjectID = T.ProjectID ) TP WHERE TP.CustomerName IS NOT NULL FOR XML PATH('') ), 1, 1, '' ) ) Content FROM S_Message T WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE T.IsDel = 0 AND T.Status = 1 AND ISNULL(T.IsRead,0) = (CASE WHEN T.MessageType IN ('12D36558-A8A1-20D4-58E5-612338026AE7') AND ISNULL(T.IsRead,0) = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AND ISNULL(T.IsApprove,0) = 0 AND T.ProjectID = #{ProjectID} ${sqlWhere} GROUP BY ProjectID,MessageType,Receiver

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.ID , A.Content , dbo.F_FormatDate(A.SendTime) SendTime , A.OpportunityID , A.CustomerPotentialID CustomerID , A.CustomerName , A.CustomerMobile , A.CreateTime , A.AllocTime , A.IsAlloc , A.IntentProjectName, A.ReportUserID , A.ReportUserName , A.MessageType , A.MessageTypeName , A.ClueID, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY A.SendTime DESC ) num, A.ClueStatus FROM V_MessageClue A WHERE A.ProjectID = #{ProjectID} ${sqlWhere} ) t WHERE t.num > ( ${PageIndex} - 1 ) * ${PageSize} AND t.num <= ${PageIndex} * ${PageSize}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.ID , A.[Content] , dbo.F_FormatDate(A.SendTime) SendTime , B.OpportunityID , C.CustomerID , C.CustomerName , C.CustomerMobile , B.ID LostID , dbo.F_FormatDate(B.CreateTime) ApplyDate , B.Reason LostCause , C.SaleUserID , dbo.F_GetSaleUserName(C.SaleUserID) SaleUserName , dbo.F_GetSaleMobile(C.SaleUserID) SaleUserMobile , ISNULL(A.IsApprove, 0) IsApprove , ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY B.EditeTime DESC , A.SendTime DESC ) num FROM S_Message A WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN B_OpportunityGiveUp B WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.BizID = B.ID INNER JOIN B_Opportunity C WITH(NOLOCK) ON B.OpportunityID = C.ID WHERE A.Receiver = #{UserID} AND A.ProjectID = #{ProjectID} AND A.IsDel = 0 AND A.Status = 1 ${sqlWhere} ) t WHERE t.num > ( ${PageIndex} - 1 ) * ${PageSize} AND t.num <= ${PageIndex} * ${PageSize}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.ID , Content , dbo.F_FormatDate(SendTime) SendTime , OpportunityID , CustomerID , CustomerName , CustomerMobile , IntentionLevel , CustomerTag , dbo.F_FormatDate(A.TheLatestFollowUpDate) TheLatestFollowUpDate , A.TheLatestFollowUpContent , OpportunityStatus , OpportunityStatusValue , IsCare , AdviserID , AdviserName , AdviserOrgName , AdviserMobile , A.YJTime , A.IsYJ , A.MessageType , A.MessageTypeName , A.IsCustomerFirstEdit , ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY A.YJTimeValue , A.EditTime DESC , A.SendTime DESC ) num FROM V_MessageOpportunity A WHERE A.Receiver = #{UserID} AND A.ProjectID = #{ProjectID} ${sqlWhere} ) t WHERE t.num > ( ${PageIndex} - 1 ) * ${PageSize} AND t.num <= ${PageIndex} * ${PageSize}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ID , Content , dbo.F_FormatDate(SendTime) SendTime , ProjectID , Receiver , MessageType , OpportunityID , ClueID , CustomerPotentialID , CustomerName , CustomerMobile , CreateTime , ClueStatus , SaleUserID , SaleUserName , IsAlloc , dbo.F_DictName(CustomerLevel) IntentionLevel , dbo.F_DictName(ISNULL(CustomerRank, '41FA0234-F8AE-434F-8BCD-6E9BE1D059DA')) AS CustomerRank , ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY A.EditTime DESC , A.SendTime DESC ) num FROM V_MessageClue A WHERE A.ProjectID = #{ProjectID} ${sqlWhere} ) t WHERE t.num > ( ${PageIndex} - 1 ) * ${PageSize} AND t.num <= ${PageIndex} * ${PageSize}
SELECT COUNT(1) Counts FROM dbo.A_ShareProject WHERE ProjectID = #{ProjectID} AND IsDel = 0 AND Status = 1

SELECT A.*, CASE WHEN A.BizType = 'Opportunity' THEN ISNULL(B.SaleUserID, A.Sender) WHEN A.BizType = 'Clue' THEN ISNULL(C.ReportUserID, A.Sender) ELSE A.Sender END CBReceiver FROM S_Message A WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN B_Opportunity B WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.BizID = B.ID AND A.BizType = 'Opportunity' LEFT JOIN B_Clue C ON A.BizID = C.ID AND A.BizType = 'Clue' WHERE A.IsDel = 0 AND A.Status = 1 AND A.ID = #{MessageID}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO S_Message( ID, ProjectID, BizID, BizType, Subject, Content, Sender, SendTime, MessageType, Receiver, IsRead, IsPush, IsNeedPush, Creator, CreateTime, IsDel, Status) VALUES( NEWID(), #{ProjectID}, #{BizID}, #{BizType}, #{Subject}, #{Content}, #{Sender}, GETDATE(), #{MessageType}, #{Receiver}, 0, 0, #{IsNeedPush}, #{Creator}, GETDATE(), 0, 1)
mapper.update: UPDATE S_Message SET IsRead = 1 , IsApprove=1, Editor = #{UserID} , EditTime = GETDATE() WHERE ID = #{MessageID}
mapper.select: SELECT A.ID, A.[Content], dbo.F_FormatDate(A.SendTime) SendTime, A.IsRead, D.DictName MessageTypeName FROM S_Message A LEFT JOIN S_Dictionary D ON A.MessageType = D.ID WHERE A.Receiver = #{UserID} AND A.IsDel = 0 AND A.Status = 1 ORDER BY A.SendTime DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE S_Message SET IsRead = 1, ReadTime = getdate(), IsApprove = 1 WHERE ID=#{ID}
UPDATE S_Message SET IsApprove = 1, Editor = '99', EditTime = GETDATE() ${SetStatus} WHERE BizType = #{BizType} AND ISNULL(IsApprove,0) = 0 ${Where}
